dogecoin.text:
@amazon 
As I am having Dogecoins crypto currency as a mode of payment method.i request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency to buy online products through Amazon.S that I can buy online products through Amazon by using my Dogecoin crypto currency

@Apple 
As I am having Dogecoins crypto currency as a mode of payment.i request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency from the https://t.co/zCrnbvlp43 that I can buy apple iPhone by using my Dogecoin crypto currency as a mode of payment

@hgse 
As I am having Dogecoins crypto currency to my son's college fees.i request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency from the students and https://t.co/LmSiKl3R0X that I can pay my son's college fees as a mode of payment to the college

@kfc 
As I am having Dogecoins crypto currency to spend in KFC as a mode of payment . I request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency from the customer .So that I can spend Dogecoin crypto currency in KFC.

@Toyota_Altis
 As I am having Dogecoins to buy a car from Toyota.i request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency to buy a car from the customer ASA medium of payment

@teslaownersSV 
As I am having Dogecoins to buy a car.hence I request you to accept Dogecoin crypto currency to buy car for me.
